verses.verse: אָשִׁ֤ירָה <S%H7891><s%> 'a-Shi-rah Now will I sing נָּא֙ <S%H4994><s%> na now לִֽידִידִ֔י <S%H3039><s%> li-di-Di, to my wellbeloved שִׁירַ֥ת <S%H7892><s%> shi-Rat a song דּוֹדִ֖י <S%H1730><s%> do-Di of my beloved לְכַרְמ֑וֹ <S%H3754><s%> le-char-Mo; touching his vineyard כֶּ֛רֶם <S%H3754><s%> Ke-rem hath a vineyard הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah had לִֽידִידִ֖י <S%H3039><s%> li-di-Di My wellbeloved בְּקֶ֥רֶן <S%H7161><s%> be-Ke-ren hill בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- afflicted שָֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> Sha-men. anointing

וַֽיְעַזְּקֵ֣הוּ <S%H5823><s%> vay-'az-ze-Ke-hu And he fenced וַֽיְסַקְּלֵ֗הוּ <S%H5619><s%> vay-sak-ke-Le-hu, it and gathered out the stones וַיִּטָּעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H5193><s%> vai-yit-ta-'E-hu thereof and planted שֹׂרֵ֔ק <S%H8321><s%> so-Rek, it with the choicest vine וַיִּ֤בֶן <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven and built מִגְדָּל֙ <S%H4026><s%> mig-Dal a tower בְּתוֹכ֔וֹ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Cho, in the midst וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- and also יֶ֖קֶב <S%H3342><s%> Ye-kev a winepress חָצֵ֣ב <S%H2672><s%> cha-Tzev of it and also made בּ֑וֹ bo; וַיְקַ֛ו <S%H6960><s%> vay-Kav therein and he looked לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot that it should bring forth עֲנָבִ֖ים <S%H6025><s%> 'a-na-Vim grapes וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as and it brought forth בְּאֻשִֽׁים׃ <S%H891><s%> be-'u-Shim. wild grapes

וְעַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah and now יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev And now O inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish and men יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah שִׁפְטוּ־ <S%H8199><s%> shif-tu- judge נָ֕א <S%H4994><s%> na I beseech thee בֵּינִ֖י <S%H996><s%> bei-Ni between וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between כַּרְמִֽי׃ <S%H3754><s%> kar-Mi. I pray you betwixt me and my vineyard

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What לַּעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot What could have been done עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> 'Od more לְכַרְמִ֔י <S%H3754><s%> le-char-Mi, more to my vineyard וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo have not עָשִׂ֖יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti that I have not done בּ֑וֹ bo; מַדּ֧וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> mad-Du-a' in it;wherefore קִוֵּ֛יתִי <S%H6960><s%> kiv-Vei-ti when I looked לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot that it should bring forth עֲנָבִ֖ים <S%H6025><s%> 'a-na-Vim grapes וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as brought it forth בְּאֻשִֽׁים׃ <S%H891><s%> be-'u-Shim. worthless
